item.content:encoded: WHOAAAA!! --> Ohio: Romney Beats Obama In D+9 Poll; Wins Indies By 20 Points http://t.co/Pk81c4dw via @BreitbartNews The good news in today's ARG poll of Ohio is not that Romney's leading 48-47%, it's that the party ID breakdown doesn't reflect anything nearing reality. There's just no way Democrats will enjoy a nine-point turnout advantage over Romney in Ohio. But in order to believe Romney's only up by one, that's exactly what you have to assume. Link - Trackbacks

item.content:encoded: CBS Reporter Lara Logan Rails Against ‘Major Lie’ of Last Two Years in Candid Speech: Islamists Are Still Strong... http://t.co/hAcALnnE Blaze readers are likely familiar with CBS correspondent, Lara Logan, the wartime journalist who endured a horrific ordeal in Egypt last summer when she was beaten and sexually assaulted by a mob of angry Egyptian men during their Arab Spring "celebrations." item.title: Did Obama Just Throw The Entire Election Away?
item.description: Unprecedented 12-point Pew swing in favor of Romney, in October. Lies work when not rebutted with 67M people watching. http://t.co/wN1oYuL6
item.content:encoded: Unprecedented 12-point Pew swing in favor of Romney, in October. Lies work when not rebutted with 67M people watching. http://t.co/wN1oYuL6 The Pew poll is devastating, just devastating. Before the debate, Obama had a 51 - 43 lead; now, Romney has a 49 - 45 lead. That's a simply unprecedented reversal for a candidate in October. Before Obama had leads on every policy issue and personal characteristic; now Romney leads in almost all of them. Obama's performance gave Romney a 12 point swing! I repeat: a 12 point swing. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: thedailybeast.com

item.content:encoded: BACKLASJ --> Politico, NBC, ABC, MSNBC Criticize Team Obama's 'Absurd' Big Bird Ad http://t.co/4XbDfXSL via @BreitbartNews A media that is obviously disappointed with Their Precious One's debate performance and recent collapse in the polls, is not at all happy with this silly and stupid Big Bird attack. item.content:encoded: Paul Ryan Address Catholics: Obama Has 'Attacked' Church Throughout Presidency http://t.co/YkW97FMf Republican Vice-Presidential nominee Paul Ryan has created a video message directed at fellow Catholics, reminding them that religious freedom will be a central issue in the Romney-Ryan administration.
